summary: Nun Sara (Shirley MacLaine) is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan (Clint Eastwood), who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.
cast: Shirley MacLaine|Clint Eastwood|Manolo Fábregas|Alberto Morin|Armando Silvestre|John Kelly|David Povall|Ada Carrasco|Pancho Córdova|José Chávez|Pedro Galván|José Ángel Espinosa 'Ferrusquilla'|Enrique Lucero|Aurora Muñoz|Xavier Marc|Hortensia Santoveña|Rosa Furman|José Torvay|Margarito Luna|Xavier Massé
title: Dos mulas y una mujer
